alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Parke; Vermillion; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 05 at 10:26AM EST until January 06 at 7:51AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... East Fork White River White River Wabash River . .Upwards of two inches of rainfall this past weekend put several rivers across central Indiana into flood. The Wabash is expected to crest near Hutsonville Wednesday...and the crest on the White River will approach Petersburg through Thursday. The East Fork White River at Rivervale will crest tonight. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Covington. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.5 feet, Some low agricultural fields flood. Backyard flood of cottages a short distance north of U.S. Highway 136. High water blocks land access to at least one residence. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 17.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM EST Wednesday was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 11.2 feet Saturday, January 15. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued this evening.
